about_the_game:
Alabeo's C207 Skywagon package for FSX brings you the regular and bush variants of the aircraft in five paint schemes - the bush variant liveries really look the part!

Features include the Alabeo GNS 530, vibration effects on start-up, top quality modelling and textures, accurate flight dynamics, gauge reflections and a full complement of PDF manuals.

  • Five HD liveries and one blank texture for repainting
  • Two C207 models – regular and bush variants
  • Realistic bush liveries with scrape effects
  • Alabeo GNS530 included
  • RealityXP GNS530 integration
  • Start-up vibration effect
  • Superb material shines and reflections
  • Volumetric side view prop effect
  • Gauges reflections
  • Windows scratches and blades shines
  • High quality 3D model and textures
  • Realistic flight behaviour
  • PDF manuals - Normal Procedures, Emergency Procedures, Performance tables and References PDF
detailed_description:
Alabeo's C207 Skywagon package for FSX brings you the regular and bush variants of the aircraft in five paint schemes - the bush variant liveries really look the part!

Features include the Alabeo GNS 530, vibration effects on start-up, top quality modelling and textures, accurate flight dynamics, gauge reflections and a full complement of PDF manuals.

  • Five HD liveries and one blank texture for repainting
  • Two C207 models – regular and bush variants
  • Realistic bush liveries with scrape effects
  • Alabeo GNS530 included
  • RealityXP GNS530 integration
  • Start-up vibration effect
  • Superb material shines and reflections
  • Volumetric side view prop effect
  • Gauges reflections
  • Windows scratches and blades shines
  • High quality 3D model and textures

  • PDF manuals - Normal Procedures, Emergency Procedures, Performance tables and References PDF

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

short_description: Alabeo's C207 Skywagon package for FSX brings you the regular and bush variants of the aircraft in five paint schemes - the bush variant liveries really look the part!
